value:
$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|A vortex of pure chaos...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Correct. The name we give this
cataclysm is the Tempest.$k$pListen well, Scion of Light.$k$pIf you can avert the tragedy of the
Tempest, you can protect one who is
very dear to you—Julia.$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|I understand. Julia, wait for me. I
swear I will save you!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Fear not. You won't go into this fight
alone. We have allies—ones you are
deeply tied to.$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|What does that mean?$k$p$WmMPID_ディアドラ,ch06_07_Diadora_F_Normal,Face|Seliph... You've gotten so big.$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|Mother?! Is that really you, Mother?$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|Seliph...$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|Father? How can this be?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Perhaps it is best to think of it as a
miracle born from chaos—and the
intermingling of time and space...$k$pSeliph... May the genealogy of light
passed down to you now bring you
strength.$k$p

$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|Julia! Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pSeliph? What am I doing here?$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|I'm just glad that you're safe.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Crisis has been averted. Space and
time should now be disentangled—
and returned to their proper order.$k$pThis, of course, goes for your family
as well...$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|Seliph...$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|Father...$k$p$WmMPID_ディアドラ,ch06_07_Diadora_F_Normal,Face|Take care of yourself, Seliph.$k$pAnd remember...we will always watch
over you.$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|Mother...$k$pI thank you both.$k$p
